headline: Assessing Constellation Brands (STZ) Valuation As CEO Succession Plans Draw Investor Attention
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) is back in focus after the company announced a planned leadership handover, with board member Nicholas Fink set to replace Bill Newlands as president and CEO on April 13, 2026. See our latest analysis for Constellation Brands. The CEO succession news has arrived after a sharp 1 day share price return of negative 8.04%, capping a 7 day share price return of negative 9.15%. A 90 day share price return of 15.59% contrasts with a 5 year total shareholder return of...
